data.text: Basically, to say his only relevancy and the reason for his death was all due to Ariana is ignorant, makes no sense, and is just plain disrespectful (AND misogynistic). He was an accomplished artist and deserves to be recognized for that, not for being someone’s ex. So RIP.

Likewise, Mac miller was an independent person and artist of Ariana Grande and to whittle down his music career and life to his relationship is extremely disrespectful and ignores his passions/his legacy.
